effect_entries.effect: Teaches Thunder Wave to a compatible Pokémon.
effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches Thunder Wave to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.text:
弱い　電撃を　浴びせることで
相手を　まひ状態に　する。

The user launches a weak jolt of
electricity that paralyzes the target.

Il nemico viene colpito da una debole scarica
elettrica che, se va a segno, ne causa la paralisi.

Quien lo usa utiliza parte de sus PS para hacer
una copia de sí mismo que sirve como señuelo.

Das Ziel wird mit einem schwachen elektrischen
Schlag angegriffen. Wird es getroffen, wird es
paralysiert.

Un faible choc électrique frappe l’ennemi.
Si l’attaque le touche, celui-ci est paralysé.

약한 전기를 날려
상대를 마비 상태로 만든다.

よわい　でんきを　あびせることで
あいてを　まひじょうたいに　する。

A weak electric charge is launched
at the target. It causes paralysis
if it hits.

A weak electric charge is launched
at the target. It causes paralysis
if it hits.

Un faible choc électrique frappe
l’ennemi. Si l’attaque touche, l’ennemi
est paralysé.

A weak electric charge is launched
at the foe. It causes paralysis if it
hits.

A weak electric charge is launched
at the foe. It causes paralysis if it
hits.

A weak electric charge is launched
at the foe. It causes paralysis if it
hits.
